ygData.subject: Mistmoore quest components
ygData.msgSnippet: When all the details about the bard armor quests came out, I was initially disappointed that I would not be able to do the quests due to my level (25 bard).  I
ygData.messageBody:
When all the details about the bard armor quests came out, I was initially
disappointed that I would not be able to do the quests due to my level (25
bard). I just assumed that I would have to wait until I was around 30th
level before starting. I guess I have been lucky so far because I have been
able to acquire six of the items. For a few of them, guildmembers in their
mid 30s helped me out. For the others, people couldn't use/loot them them
so they let me loot the items.

Always willing to take a risk, I'm thinking about heading to Mistmoore after
I get the bracelet in Unrest. Need to get an idea of how tough the deadly
usher and gypsy musicians are. I hope to join with a higher level group
(assuming they will accept a 25 bard in the group). Assuming a full group
of six, what level characters are required to fight against these mobs?

Also, the only places I've gone to in Mistmoore are the initial areas beside
the lake and the graveyard. Nothing I ran into in those locations could see
through the invisibility song. Are there any mobs deeper in the zone that
can See Invis? I would assume that the DE casters can buff themselves with
the spell. Got a bad feeling that all the gargoyles can as well. Still
willing to take the chance though.

Galtin of E'ci
